sqls.sql: UPDATE cr_dlv_his SET cr_dlv_his_id = @cr_dlv_his_id, client_no = @client_no, part_no = @part_no, part_idt = @part_idt, cr_dlv_his_year = @cr_dlv_his_year, cr_dlv_his_week = @cr_dlv_his_week, cr_dlv_his_qty = @cr_dlv_his_qty, mrp_region_no = @mrp_region_no, cr_dlv_his_rmk1 = @cr_dlv_his_rmk1, cr_dlv_his_rmk2 = @cr_dlv_his_rmk2, cr_dlv_his_rmk3 = @cr_dlv_his_rmk3, cr_dlv_his_rmk4 = @cr_dlv_his_rmk4, cr_dlv_his_rmk5 = @cr_dlv_his_rmk5, cr_dlv_his_rmk6 = @cr_dlv_his_rmk6, crt_time = @crt_time, crt_user = @crt_user, crt_user_no = @crt_user_no, crt_user_name = @crt_user_name, crt_host = @crt_host, upd_time = @upd_time, upd_user = @upd_user, upd_user_no = @upd_user_no, upd_user_name = @upd_user_name, upd_host = @upd_host;
